lyrics.stanza: My spirit, soul, and body, Dear Lord, I give to Thee, A consecrated offering, Thine evermore to be.
Lord Jesus, mighty Savior, I trust in Thy great name; I look for Thy salvation, Thy promise now I claim.
Now, Lord, I yield my members, From sin's dominion free, For warfare and for triumph, As weapons unto Thee.
Oh, blissful self-surrender, To live, my Lord, by Thee; Now, Son of God, my Savior, Live out Thy life in me.
I'm Thine, O dear Lord Jesus, Washed in Thy precious blood, Sealed by Thy Holy Spirit, A sacrifice to God.
